alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Fayette; Lee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bastrop, southeastern Lee and northeastern Fayette Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1051 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Giddings, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Giddings, La Grange, Smithville, Fayetteville, Round Top, Carmine, Northrup, Rutersville, Warrenton, Ledbetter, Waldeck, Plum, Buescher State Park, Hills, Mullins Prairie, Nechanitz, Serbin, Rabbs Prairie, Ellinger and Warda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
